title: Last VOD 
description: to get the last VOD link of a twitch streamer in the chat

*OBS WS v5.x*{.obs-version-badge} 
# Import Code
```text

```
# Installation
Import the Code above to Streamer.bot

# Configuration
|Command|Purpose|
|---|---|
|`!lastVOD` @userName | display date and title of the stream with its link in the Chat  |
